info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 9:06PM EST until January 03 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow is expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Parts of eastern Maryland, central and southern Delaware, and southeastern and far southern New Jersey. * WHEN...From 4:00 AM until 4:00 PM Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for your state can be obtained by dialing 5 1 1.
